recommended_degree: Teknik Elektro, Teknik Elektro Industri, Elektro Mekanika, Elektronika, Elektronika Industri (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
1. Design and development: Create and develop electrical and electronic devices, components, and systems, from concept to final product.
2. Testing and maintenance: Inspect and test electrical equipment, systems, and components for safety, reliability, and performance. Conduct preventive maintenance and troubleshoot issues.
3. Project management: Oversee the manufacturing, installation, and construction of electrical systems to ensure they conform to specifications and codes.
4. Technical planning: Prepare technical plans, diagrams, and specifications for electrical systems and equipment.
5. Analysis and reporting: Analyze customer feedback, assess problems, perform data analysis, and write reports on projects and studies.
6. Compliance and safety: Ensure all work complies with electrical codes, standards, and safety regulations.
7. Collaboration: Work with other engineers, technicians, and cross-functional teams to complete projects.
8. Procurement: Prepare specifications for purchasing necessary electrical equipment and materials.
